Cash and Equivalents: cash and cash equivalents at carrying value
Marketable Securities (Short-term): short term investments excluding debt securities trading
trading account assets supporting insurance liabilities fair value
Receivables: reinsurance recoverable and deposit receivables including reinsurance premium paid

Intangible Assets (net): value of business acquired v o b a
Long-term Investments: available for sale securities debt securities
available for sale securities equity securities
investments in affiliates subsidiaries associates and joint ventures
loans and leases receivable related parties
mortgage loans on real estate commercial and consumer net
total commercial mortgage and other loans

Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income: accumulated other comprehensive income loss net of tax
Common Stock and APIC: additional paid in capital common stock
Treasury Stock: class b stock held in treasury

Other Current Liabilities: obligation to return securities received as collateral
reinsurance payable and funds withheld payable
Short-term Debt: securities sold under agreements to repurchase

Long-term Debt: notes issued by consolidated variable interest entities
notes of consolidated variable interest entities
Other Non-Current Liabilities: variable interest entity consolidated carrying amount liabilities

__unmapped__: assets of disposal group including discontinued operation
due to affiliate current and noncurrent
liabilities of disposal group including discontinued operation
liability for future policy benefits and unpaid claims and claims adjustment expense
notes payable related parties current and noncurrent
redeemable noncontrolling interest equity carrying amount
